recipesJson.name: Strawberry hard candy
recipesJson.author: Kau_barros
recipesJson.description:
A refreshing strawberry hard candy.

(Recently added 3% Ripe)
Fuji and dragonfruit helps rounding and sweeting things up. 

Hope you enjoy!
Lots of love and flavor <3

reviews.text: This is very refreshing fruit vape. The Fuji is the dominant note with the strawberry piggybacking along the way to drive home the flavor profile. I made a few substitutions as I didnâ€™t have cotton candy or the currant. So I used CAP super sweet at .25% and RF Yumberry at .75%. Very nice vape!
